member.summary: Handles Bestiary automation and ease-of-use.

member.name: M:NPCUtils.BestiaryHelper.BuildEntry(Terraria.ModLoader.ModNPC,System.String)
member.summary:
Builds a BestiaryInfoElement for the given NPC with the given conditions.
Also automatically generates a bestiary entry for the NPC, defaults to .

member.name: T:NPCUtils.BestiaryExtensions
member.summary: Used to simplify bestiary entry writing by extending a method onto .

member.name: M:NPCUtils.BestiaryExtensions.AddInfo(Terraria.GameContent.Bestiary.BestiaryEntry,Terraria.ModLoader.ModNPC,System.String)
member.summary:
Automatically applies the localized entry and conditions to the npc.
Valid entries are as follows:
Biomes:
TheCorruption TheCrimson Surface Graveyard UndergroundJungle TheUnderworld TheDungeon Underground TheHallow UndergroundMushroom Jungle Caverns UndergroundSnow Ocean SurfaceMushroom UndergroundDesert Snow Desert Meteor Oasis SpiderNest TheTemple CorruptUndergroundDesert CrimsonUndergroundDesert HallowUndergroundDesert HallowDesert CorruptDesert CrimsonDesert Granite UndergroundCorruption UndergroundCrimson UndergroundHallow Marble CorruptIce HallowIce CrimsonIce Sky NebulaPillar VortexPillar StardustPillar SolarPillar
Times:
DayTime NightTime
Events:
Rain SlimeRain WindyDay BloodMoon Halloween Christmas Eclipse Party Events.Blizzard Sandstorm
Visuals:
Sun Moon EclipseSun Visuals.PumpkinMoon Visuals.FrostMoon Meteor Rain Visuals.Blizzard
Invasions:
Goblin Pirates Martian Invasions.PumpkinMoon Invasions.FrostMoon OldOnesArmy FrostLegion
For example, adding an entry could be like this:
entry.AddInfo(this, "NightTime Snow Moon");
member.param: The NPC this entry is attatched to.

member.name: M:NPCUtils.NPCUtils.AutoloadModBannersAndCritters(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod)
member.summary:
Autoloads all banners and critter items in the mod, given that the associated NPC uses or .
Make sure to use if you use this in order to properly reload content if needed.
member.param: The mod to autoload banners from.

member.name: M:NPCUtils.NPCUtils.UnloadMod(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod)
member.summary: Removes the flag for having autoloaded content for the given mod, allowing rebuilds to add content again properly.
member.param: The mod to remove the flag from.
